# AppStoreVersionReleaseRequestCreateRequest

**Object**

The request body you use to manually release an App Store approved version of your app.

## Declaration

```swift
object AppStoreVersionReleaseRequestCreateRequest
```

## Objects

- **AppStoreVersionReleaseRequestCreateRequest.Data**: The data element of the request body.

## Objects

- **AppStoreVersionReleaseRequestResponse**: A response that contains a single App Store Version Release Request resource.
- **AppStoreVersionReleaseRequest**: The data structure that represents an App Store Version Release Request resource.
